site.title: BF Photography
site.subtitle: Capturing the Spirit of Motorcycles
site.description: Motorcycle photography showcasing racing, custom builds, and off-road adventures
site.author: Ben Foggon

about.title: About My Photography
about.content: I'm passionate about capturing the raw energy and beauty of motorcycles. From track racing to custom builds, I document the culture and craftsmanship that makes motorcycling special. Each photo tells a story of speed, style, and freedom.

highlights.title: Professional Quality
highlights.description: High-resolution images perfect for prints and digital use

highlights.title: Motorcycle Specialist
highlights.description: Specialized in racing, custom builds, and adventure photography

highlights.title: Passion Driven
highlights.description: Every shot captures the soul and spirit of the ride
